name: NoSeq
description:
You ever had dreams but never kept a dream diary? Me neither!

This game is a throwback to dreaming and not having your cake, don't remember anything? No worries, you'll forget everything after today too!

This game is basically a simulation on what a dream could hypothetically be. What is a dream? What is a nightmare? What is your mind that causes you to have a weird dream that doesn't make sense? Are we guilty? Are we innocent? 

Thinking can be weird, and even when we don't think dreams can be what our subconscious thinks. I might be wrong, I'm not an expert, I'm just a dude who made a game.

This game is also a throwback to pixel shaded games that were released on the original Playstation such as Ridge Racer or Doom for the Playstation (albeit different genres). I also mainly got inspiration from Osamu Sato and LSD Dream Emulator, thank you.

Made for Halloween 2020.

Adil S - Director, Creative Director, Game Design, 3D Art, Level Design, Tech Art

Austin Lothman - 3D Artist (keys)

Game audio from;

Mixkit

Dl Sound

Zapslat
